ability.Wonder Skin: 50% to avoid the status moves from the opponent used on this Pokemon.
ability.Psychic Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon creates a Psychic Terrain which lasts for 5 turns.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Mind Blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Fairy Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage each.
